I liked this...  and I loved the image of Saitou infiltrating a fancy 
ball in a caterer's uniform, not to mention the inevitable mayhem to ensue.

I do have a question about the Rokumeikan, though.  Is that the setting 
for the end of Lady Snowblood?  The description sounds almost exact (two 
levels, wealthy Japanese in western clothes, etc.).

    Arigatou,
    Chuck
